data.text: Sɛ Efraim kasa a, na nnipa ho popo;
Afei, wɔkɔ so yɛ bɔne ara;
Ɛno enti, wɔbɛyɛ sɛ anɔpa omununkum
Memaa wɔn aduane no, wɔdi meeɛ;
Enti, mɛto ahyɛ wɔn so sɛ gyata,
Mɛto ahyɛ wɔn so na matete wɔn mu
Wo ɔhene a ɔbɛgye wo no wɔ he?
Enti mʼabufuo mu, memaa wo ɔhene,
Ɔbɛte ɔyea te sɛ ɔbaa a ɔreko awoɔ,
“Mɛpata agye wɔn afiri damena tumi mu.
mpo sɛ ɔyɛ yie wɔ ne nuanom mu a.
Ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ Samaria gye wɔn afɔdie to mu,
